name: Electroshock Therapy
description: When casting a Lightning Spell, greatly affect the psychology of your target and their mount. After combat, your target suffers -6 Mag/Cha and halves any healing they receive for 1 turn. Additionally, if your target is mounted, they cannot benefit from the Canto skill. Thoron Variant: Any foes between you and Thoron’s target are also affected by Electroshock Therapy.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
